data.title: B Tunnel to B Main Hot Hands
data.description: This is a good Hot Hands to burn enemies pushing onto B Site and to also delay a push onto B Site by blocking the entrance in flames.

data.title: A Pyramid to A Cave Curveball
data.description: This is a good Curveball to blind enemies pushing onto A Site or to blind enemies in A Cave to delay a push or to swing onto.
